name: Network Traffic
description: The network traffic object describes network data traffic.

direction_id.description: The direction of the network traffic.

1.name: Inbound
1.description: Inbound network traffic. The traffic was originated from the Internet or outside network, destined for services on the inside network.

2.name: Outbound
2.description: Outbound network traffic. The traffic was originated from inside the network, destined for services on the Internet or outside network.

3.name: Local
3.description: Local network traffic on the same endpoint.

4.name: Internal
4.description: Internal network traffic between two endpoints inside network.

5.name: External
5.description: External network traffic between two endpoints on the Internet or outside the network.

dst.description: The destination of the network traffic. If the reported traffic is bidirectional, then the endpoint that received a request for the data and sent back a response.

src.description: The source of the network traffic. If the reported traffic is bidirectional, then the endpoint that sent a request for the data.
